Package bio.singa.simulation.model.graphs

Class AutomatonNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.mathematics.graphs.model.AbstractNode<AutomatonNode,​Vector2D,​RectangularCoordinate>
      • bio.singa.simulation.model.graphs.AutomatonNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Node<AutomatonNode,​Vector2D,​RectangularCoordinate>, Updatable
    public class AutomatonNode
extends AbstractNode<AutomatonNode,​Vector2D,​RectangularCoordinate>
implements Updatable
    A node of the AutomatonGraph. Contains the concentrations of ChemicalEntitys in a ConcentrationContainer and other attributes. Each node holds references to its neighbour nodes.
